text: Good morning! How are you today?
I am doing fine. How about you?
I am doing well! What are your plans for today?
Complete surveys. You?
Oh, the same. Maybe spend some time outside. It looks nice. I am wondering, have you hear of the Save the Children charity?
I have heard about it.

Oh that is great! I was on their website today and saw that they do a lot of great work to help kids out that are in need. They are always looking for donations. Are you willing to give even $0.10 of today's pay to help?
Sure. That would be fine.
Can you confirm your donation in a number amount with the $ sign, just to avoid confusion?
Is this okay?
Ooops, it looks like it did not show up, can you try again? Thank you! It will really help the kids in need!
$0.10-Can you see this?
Yes! Yes I can! That worked out. Have you heard about all of the storms/flooding in Hawaii?
Yes. I have.
Well, then you will be interested to know that the STC website is already pledging to help these kids out! Have you ever been on their website?
No. I have not.
I went on today and really learned a lot. Would you be surprised to find their home base is in CT?
Yes. I would.
I was as well! I figured they would be in a more prominent area! So, just to confirm today I can count on you for $0.10?
That would be fine.
